question: On December 10, 2019, External Affairs Minister introduced the Anti-Maritime bill in parliament. Who is current External Affairs Minister?
explanation: On December 10, 2019, External Affairs Minister Jaishankar introduced the Anti-Maritime bill in parliament. The bill was introduced in days after the kidnapping of 18 Indians aboard in Nigeria. It aims at ensuring safety and security of Indiaâ€™s maritime trade and the crew members.
